channel.title: The Last Angry Man
channel.description:
From the Podcast Capital of the world, this is "The Last Angry Man". Listen to his "infamous" diatribes everyday. Political yes, Thoughtful yes, Passion, you bet. Angry is odd but the question is, is he right? Or is he just left of a spot at Bellevue? Angry is just that. Angry says "I want people to think debate and even argue about the important issues on my mind". Indeed! He now has a huge following in the podcast world. One listener says "He is so crazy, yet he hits a nerve". So don't make Angry angry send him comments and listen to his daily rant. "Go on I dare you" Angry says. The Last Angry Man - The Everyman. daily, from the Podcast Capital of the world. Now also from the Podcast Capital hear "Good Evening He lied. Starring Rob Nelson, The Gen X Wunderkind, And "The Producer".
Hear The Last Angry Man-250 vital podcats. vital, and yes hilarious, Progressive Political information. “A podcast that matters” TNYTL News 2007
channel.itunes:subtitle: Listen To These "Infamous" Diatribes Everyday.
channel.itunes:author: The Last Angry Man

item.description:

In hospital... Release-perhaps Sunday-Monday. Sources say.

item.title: Did we budget for stupidity-Angry says no we should!
item.description: Did we budget for stupidity-Angry says no we should! Taxpayers in United States will pay $378.0 billion for the cost of war in Iraq. For the same amount of money, the following could have been provided: 107,796,841 People with Health Care or 6,435,412 Elementary School Teachers or 51,873,199 Head Start Places for Children or 161,204,628 Children with Health Care or 2,940,426 Affordable Housing Units or 38,024 New Elementary Schools or 62,398,244 Scholarships for University Students or 6,562,500 Music and Arts Teachers or 8,458,741 Public Safety Officers or 391,327,406 Homes with Renewable Electricity or 5,681,007 Port Container Inspectors

item.title: Angry says life has no meaning-
item.description: The Last Angry man-Some say this everywman has gone to far in this podcast. Claiming that life has no meaning. Listen as Angry tries to prove something to his fellow podsters. Is Angry insane or on to something.

item.description: The Last Angry mans daily diatribe about the Looney zany world we live in. Imagine Maxwell Smart (Agent 86) as the president of the United States. Very interesting-Bush and Max. kind of works. It more than works. . It is a perfect match. Now the cone of silence is off and The Last Angry Man is mad as hell and he can not take it anymore. Folks every day you can see him rant and rave. The last Angry Man he was the producer for such classic hit TV shows as Howard Stern, Morton Downey Jr., The Richard Bey Show and Lovline for MTV. From Route 3 in Secaucus to Sunset Boulevard L.A, Grown in Scarsdale lost in Santa Monica , this is your home to let it all out so that someday with any luck we can all get back in.
